narrative.iWantTo: use the system without any errors

scenario.title: Student books timeslot in session of a course
scenario.step: When a student 12 selects a session 25 and a particular timeslot 15 of a course 2
Then student 12 is enrolled in the session 25 of the course 2

scenario.title: Student books timeslot in session of a course

Then student 11 is enrolled in the session 20 of the course 3

scenario.title: Student books timeslot in session of a course

scenario.title: Student books timeslot in session of a course
